June wedding plans for Mindy Gerber and Comdr. Charles Harry Barber 3d, U.S.N., have been announced by the prospective bride's parents, Mr. and Mrs. Herman B. Gerber of Charlottesville, Va. Commander Barber is a son of Janet Forester Barber of West Chester, Pa., and the late Mr. Barber Jr. Miss Gerber, who attended Hamilton College, is an independent producer of television commercials, as was her father, who is retired. Her mother, Carol Gerber, retired as a fashion stylist. Commander Barber, known as Chip, is the director of sailing at the United States Naval Academy in Annapolis, Md. He graduated from Franklin and Marshall College and received a master's in administration from George Washington University and a specialist of education degree from the University of Virginia. His father was a real-estate agent in West Chester.
